3.title: Fibonacci forever
3.description: Create a work that uses the Fibonacci sequence in some way.

4.title: Lowres
4.description: An image or graphic with low resolution, where details are simplified or pixelated.

6.title: Lights on/off
6.description: Make something that changes when you switch on or off the "digital" lights.

7.title: Boolean algebra
7.description: Get inspired by Boolean algebra, in any way.

11.title: Quine
11.description: A Quine is a form of code poetry, it's a computer program that outputs exactly its own source code.

13.title: Self portrait
13.description: For example, get started with a very basic human face, a few circles or oval shapes. How far can you improve this by adding features that actually look like you.

15.title: Invisible object
15.description: Create an invisible object where only the shadows can be seen.

17.title: Wallpaper group
17.description: There are only 17 ways to cover a plane with a repeating pattern, choose your favourite.

18.title: Unexpected path
18.description: Draw a route that changes direction based on one very simple rule.

20.title: One line
20.description: An artwork that is made of a single line only.

21.title: Bauhaus Poster
21.description: Create a poster design inspired by the German art school Bauhaus.

25.title: Organic Geometry
25.description: Forms that look or act organic but are constructed entirely from geometric shapes.

26.title: Recursive Grids
26.description: Split the canvas into a grid of some kind and recurse on each cell again and again.

27.title: Lifeform
27.description: A shape or structure that behaves as if it's alive or growing.

28.title: No libraries, no canvas, only HTML elements
28.description: No libraries, no canvas, only HTML elements.

30.title: Its not a bug, its a feature
30.description: Its not a bug, its a feature.

31.title: GLSL day
31.description: Create an artwork using only shaders.
